titleStmt.title: An extraordinary collection of paintings, and several other curiosities, by the best masters. Will be now sold by auction, on Tuesday the 5th. of this instant May, 1691. at three of the clock afternoon, in the Auction-Office in the west-end of the Royal Exchange, and so to continue from day to day till all be sold Catalogues whereof are to be had at the said office.

An extraordinary collection of paintings, and several other curiosities, by the best masters. Will be now sold by auction, on Tuesday the 5th. of this instant May, 1691. at three of the clock afternoon, in the Auction-Office in the west-end of the Royal Exchange, and so to continue from day to day till all be sold Catalogues whereof are to be had at the said office.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
